meanings.definition: A person who serves food and drinks to customers in their cars at a drive-in restaurant.
meanings.sent1: The carhops at the drive-in restaurant were friendly and efficient.
meanings.sent2: Customers enjoy the convenience of having carhops bring their orders to their vehicles.
meanings.sent3: The carhops joked with the customers, making the dining experience fun.
meanings.sent4: The carhops were like speedy delivery fairies, magically appearing with trays of food.
meanings.sent5: The image of the carhops balancing trays on roller skates is unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The act of serving food and drinks to customers in their cars at a drive-in restaurant.
meanings.sent1: Carhops require good balance to carry trays of food to cars without spilling.
meanings.sent2: The manager praised the carhops for their hard work during the busy lunch rush.
meanings.sent3: During the carhops' break, they enjoyed a quick snack in the shade.
meanings.sent4: The carhops' synchronized movements resembled a well-choreographed dance.
meanings.sent5: The carhops' efficiency kept the drive-in restaurant running smoothly.
